mapper.select: SELECT jse.sample_name, count(jse.sample_name) as test_numb, ROUND(AVG(jse.step_41), 2) as half_year_avg, IFNULL(std.size_limit, '') as 'size_limit',IFNULL(std.size_limit_control,'') as 'size_limit_control' FROM jumbo_step_entity jse INNER JOIN jumbo_std std on jse.sample_name = std.sample_name GROUP BY jse.sample_name

SELECT t5.*, (t5.half_year_avg - t5.size_center_value) as 'agv_size_center_value' FROM ( SELECT t4.sample_name, COUNT(t4.sample_name) as test_numb, ROUND(AVG(t4.step_41), 1) as half_year_avg, IFNULL(jsd.size_limit, '') as 'size_limit',IFNULL(jsd.size_limit_control,'') as 'size_limit_control', ROUND((jsd.size_limit_up_std+jsd.size_limit_down_std)/2) as 'size_center_value' FROM ( SELECT jse.* FROM jumbo_step_entity jse WHERE sample_name IN ( SELECT DISTINCT t1.sample_name FROM jumbo_step_entity t1 INNER JOIN jumbo_std t2 ON t1.sample_name = t2.sample_name AND t1.step_41 NOT BETWEEN t2.size_limit_control_up_std AND t2.size_limit_control_down_std )) t4,jumbo_std jsd WHERE jsd.sample_name = t4.sample_name GROUP BY sample_name) t5

SELECT t3.* FROM ( SELECT t1.sample_name,lot_no,jumbo_no,step_41, (CASE WHEN step_41 < t2.size_limit_down_std THEN '低于规格下限' WHEN step_41 >t2.size_limit_up_std THEN '高于规格上限' WHEN step_41 >= t2.size_limit_down_std AND step_41 < t2.size_limit_control_down_std THEN '大于规格下限且小于管控下限' WHEN step_41 > t2.size_limit_control_up_std AND step_41 <= t2.size_limit_up_std THEN '大于管控上限且小于规格上限' ELSE '在管控范围之内' END) as 'warning_info' FROM jumbo_step_entity t1 INNER JOIN jumbo_std t2 ON t1.sample_name = t2.sample_name AND t1.step_41 NOT BETWEEN t2.size_limit_control_up_std AND t2.size_limit_control_down_std ) t3 WHERE t3.sample_name = #{sampleName} AND t3.warning_info != '在管控范围之内' ORDER BY lot_no
